dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Sidbury, Heather - Heather G [mailto:Heather.G.Sidbury@Lowes.com] 
Posted At: Monday, November 20, 2006 8:46 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Notice
Subject: DMCA Notice



 

Please see the attached DMCA notice.  Please confirm your compliance
within 24 hours.  

 

Regards,

Heather Sidbury

 

 

Heather G. Sidbury

Counsel

Lowe's Companies, Inc.

1000 Lowe's Boulevard

Mooresville, NC 28117

704-758-2862

heather.g.sidbury@lowes.com

 

 

The content of this email transmission contains information which may be
confidential and/or privileged. The information is intended to be for
the use of the individual or entity named on this transmission. If you
are not the intended recipient, please advise by return e-mail and
delete immediately without reading or forwarding to others. Thank you,
Heather G. Sidbury, Counsel, Lowe's Companies, Inc.
